Inside A Camera

A camera is an optical instrument used to record images. At their most basic, cameras are sealed boxes (the camera body) with a small hole (the aperture) that let light in to capture an image on a light-sensitive surface (usually photographic film or a digital sensor). A camera has many uses that range far and wide....
The list is lon and as always here at TechNewz we have compiled a list for you!

ObsidianPictures

Obsidian is a TechNewz organized and sponsored company that utilised drones in the mapping of geographical areas that human beings can't be able to reach.It is also used for filming in the film industry.
